data.slogan: Use NLP to go beyond vanilla word2vec
data.description: sense2vec ([Trask et. al](https://arxiv.org/abs/1511.06388), 2015) is a nice twist on [word2vec](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Word2vec) that lets you learn more interesting, detailed and context-sensitive word vectors. For an interactive example of the technology, see our [sense2vec demo](https://explosion.ai/demos/sense2vec) that lets you explore semantic similarities across all Reddit comments of 2015.
